title: Relationship
description: This schema is used to set variation relationships for merchant SKUs

relationship.description:
Variation or Accessory

			#Logic

			This field is required if you are setting up a Variation relationship between a set merchant SKUs

			#Valid Values

			* Variation

			* Accessory

variation_refinements.description:
The attribute ID associated with the characteristic the parent-children SKUs relate on
			
			#Valid Values

			The valid 'variation_refinements vary depending on the jet_browse_node_id, see category specific documentation for details

children_skus.description:
The merchant SKUs that are a the child SKUs
				
			#Valid Values

			Must be an uploaded merchant SKU
